name: XML Generator
description: Reads in an XML file and selects elements from it to stream further. Node that this generator reads the full XML into memory.

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: Optionally specify on which nodes to run and how many instances you want on each node.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of node handler, one of SingleNode, SomeNodes, AllNodes (leave empty for local execution)

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: The nodes to use for this node handler type

parameters.name: instances
parameters.description: The amount of instances per node of this handler type

parameters.name: stop_on_error
parameters.description: If set to false, Tuktu will not kill the flow on data error.

parameters.name: file_name
parameters.description: The file name to read XML from.

parameters.name: as_text
parameters.description: Whether or not to turn the content of the XML nodes into text.

parameters.name: trim
parameters.description: Whether or not to trim the text if as_text is set to true.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of selector, can be either \ for children, \\ for descendants or @ for attributes.
